MEP profile
 
Emmanouil ANGELAKAS
Group of the European People's Party (Christian Democrats) and European Democrats
Member
Greece
  emmanouil.angelakas@europarl.europa.eu
Nea Dimokratia
Born on 26 November 1960, Athina 		   http://www.angelakas.gr 

Member
Committee on Regional Development [See]
Delegation to the EU-Russia Parliamentary Cooperation Committee [See]

Substitute
Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection [See]

Curriculum vitae
1978: graduated from the Varvakeion Model School and entered the Athens School of Pharmacy graduating in 1982.
1984-1990: production and plant manager in the Greek pharmaceutical sector. Over the same period studied at the Athens University Chemistry Department. 1990: founded his own company, Representative for industrial products and equipment in the chemical and pharmaceutical sector.
From 1997 to date: chairman of the Α3 Prefectural ND Committee and member of the ND Central Committee. Trade union activities in the pharmaceuticals sector. Secretary (1987-1991) and chairman (1991-1996) of the Panhellenic Union of Pharmacists.
Active participation in many scientific congresses. Scientific papers published in pharmaceutical journals. Member of pharmaceutical science associations.
